full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DBANG CHU BDE CHEN MYU GU DANG YANG GSANG KHROS PA LHA DBANG GI YI GE RNYING PA BZHUGS SO, , *, ,DBANG CHU BDE CHEN MYU GU NI,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @012B (MANG THOS SLOB MA 'GA' YI BSKUL BA'I NGOR, ,LE LO'I DBANG GYUR DPAL LDAN SENG GES SBYAR, ,GAL TE 'DI SBYAR BA LA NONGS GYUR GANG, ,BLA MA YI DAM MKHA' 'GRO TSOGS BZOD MDZOD, ,RNAM DAG RGYUD SDE'I DGONGS PA JI LTA BAR, ,RNAM DAG BLO YIS LEGS PAR RTAGS DE SPYAD, ,RNAM DAG BLA MA'I GSUNG NGAG LA BRTEN NAS, ,RNAM DAG DBANG GI CHO GA SBYAR BA LA, ,RNAM DAG TSOGS GNYIS DGE LA GANG BSKRUN PA, ,RNAM DAG RGYAL BA'I GO 'PHANGS THOB PAR @013A *, ,SHOG ,PADMA DBANG CHEN YANG GSANG KHROS PA'I DKYIL 'KHOR DU 'JUG CING, DBANG BSKUR BA'I CHO GA BDE CHEN MYU GU ZHES BYA BA, MI 'PHROG PA'I MKHYEN RAB THUGS RJE'I BDAG NYID, CHOS RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I ZHABS KYI PADMA DRI MA MED PA SPYI BOR LEN PA, DGE SLONG RDO RJE 'DZIN PA DPAL LDAN SENG GES, DAM PA'I DBEN GNAS DPAL MUS SRAS KYI GTZUG LAG KHANG DU YI DAM GYI LHA LA GSOL BA BTAB TE NYE BAR SBYAR BA 'DI YONGS SU RDZOGS SO, ,MANGGA LAm, ,)
